stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
Change the common selectors of product page for a grid with all variants.

Display a table with options on rows and columns: I. E: columns for sizes and rows for colors Disable unavailable variants: the customer can easily see what options have and which variants are unavailable Simplify cart view, group all product variants into one line and edit quantities Send an order confirmation with the same grid style, much more readable and comprehensive

This customization has three areas:

Product form: A form created from a product variantsâ€™ options / Style similar to a spreadsheet Cart: Grouping all variants of a single product in one line. / Editing products: modify quantities of variants directly on cart Order confirmation: Adaptation of order confirmation to the customer and the store owner to represent products with sizes and colors grouped
title: Product grid form
